Articles.Description: Sorry, but that live-action The Hunchback of Notre Dame movie isn’t actually being made. A fan-made movie poster has been floating around the internet showing a star-studded cast attached to the proposed Disney film, which allegedly had a release date for 202…
Articles.Content:
Sorry, but that live-action The Hunchback of Notre Dame movie isn’t actually being made.
